messages.content: Can you please switch your emotional voice off and then just talk to me?

/speak(text={I've turned off my emotional voice now and will talk to you plainly.})
/settings(key={emotional-voice},value={false})
Okay, can you please put onyx?

/speak(text={I've switched to the Onyx voice now.})
/settings(key={voice-name},value={onyx})
Can you put on Spotify the other music before?
/speak(text={I need more details. Which playlist or song do you mean by the other music before?})
By that I just want you to go back one track just backwards.
/speak(text={Okay, I will go back one track on Spotify.})
No, you need to use this Spotify module. Just on this Spotify module, do whatever you have to do to go back a track.
/speak(text={Understood, I'll use the Spotify module to go back one track.})
Alright, can you please tell me what's currently in the tamper every folder?

/speak(text={Iâ€™ll check what is inside the tamper every folder for you.})
/reprompt(prompt={List the contents of the tamper every folder.},context={Tristan asked what's currently in the tamper every folder. Contents have not been listed yet.})
